• The risk of preterm labor, IUGR, and abortion still exist and the oncological outcomes are similar to non- pregnant
women.
Considerations During Surgery 
• When cancer surgery is indicated in pregnancy for the diagnosis, treatment, and staging, it should be done if it
cannot be delayed until fetal maturity or the post-partum period.
• Surgical procedures are best undertaken in the second trimester to prevent spontaneous abortion from
complications
